long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IG Auto Like extension can automatically like Instagram posts, enhancing your engagement.

Likes are a cost-effective strategy to attract potential followers, which is particularly beneficial for new users.

Enter a hashtag that is both relevant to your niche and popular, making sure there's a large volume of posts for liking. When you select a hashtag in widespread use, the IG Auto Like extension targets the freshest Instagram posts, many of which were likely shared only minutes ago––some mere seconds before. This strategy enhances the likelihood of reaching users who are active at that moment, perhaps even holding their phone, poised to explore your profile. Should they find your content enticing, there is a chance they will follow you. While not all will engage, some will, offering you an opportunity to gradually build connections and rapport with an emerging audience.

But how do we identify users who are interested in our content if they haven't published any posts with such tags before? Our target audience is those who interact with posts featuring these tags through likes and comments; this is sufficient for identifying them.

👨🏻‍💻 Features
✓ Automatically like the latest posts with a specified hashtag
✓ Automatically like the latest posts of users who have commented on a specific post
✓ Automatically like the latest posts of users who have liked a specified post
✓ Automatically like the latest posts of the followers/following of a specified user

📃 How to Start Liking the Latest Posts with a Specified Hashtag?
- Input the desired Instagram hashtag or navigate to the hashtag's profile where the extension will automate the hashtag entry
- Click the 'Start Liking' button

📃 How to Start Liking the Latest Posts of Users Who Have Commented on or Liked a Specific Post
- Paste the link of the post or open the post first and then launch the extension, the extension will automatically fill in the link of the post
- Select which List to Like: Comments or Likes
- Click the 'Start Liking' button

📃 How to Start Liking the Latest Posts of the Followers/Following of a Specified User?
- Enter the Instagram username; alternatively, activate the extension while on an Instagram user's profile to have the username filled in automatically.
- Select which List to Like: Followers or Following
- Click the 'Start Liking' button

📌 Limitation Mitigation Strategies
- For every 6 posts liked, take a 10 minutes cooldown period
- You can customize the number of people and the number of minutes for cooldown in the settings.

🩹 Advanced Error Resolution
- In the event of an error, the system pauses for 30 minutes before attempting again
- Personalize the pause duration within the settings menu

🟢 represents the user-defined time interval being used
🟠 represents the cooldown time interval plus the user-defined time interval being used
🔴 represents the pause time interval being used

⚠️ Caution
Unfortunately, Instagram has limits, and these limits vary from account to account. For this reason, we limit the processing time and the number of likes. We recommend using the extension sparingly to ensure its continuous functionality.

📬 Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

🔒 Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

ℹ️ Clarification
INSTAGRAM is the registered trademark of Instagram, LLC. IG Auto Like is independently operated and is neither endorsed nor affiliated with Instagram, Inc. or its entities.
